reviewText:
We bought this video also for the 2.5 yrs old granddaughter and she just loved it too. She loved the songs and was dancing to the music.
would buy again.
G.D., Topeka Ks.
great for toddlers...my daughter loves it. very educational,musical and entertaining. i would reccomened it for kids ages 2-5..;) such a great video

It arrived promptly and my grandaughter is enjoying it.
I had the other 2 noodlebugs.
I hope a nice teaching tool
My 3 year old granddaughter loves this. It is entertaining and educational at the same time without being "loud and in-your-face." I highly recommend the Noodlebug DVDs/tapes.
